tool_description: API to get words of wisdom by Master Hsing Yun
name: Master Hsing Yun's quotes
title: Master Hsing Yun's quotes

api_list.name: qoute
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://master-hsing-yuns-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "master-hsing-yuns-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://master-hsing-yuns-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "master-hsing-yuns-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
